translation.en: Still time to change your mind.
Like a race to see who'd die first.
Terminal patient outlives the rest of humanity.
translation.es: Paciente terminal vive más que toda la humanidad.

translation.en: Someone should put you in a medical journal.
If you stop the transfusions, you won't last a week.
translation.es: Si dejas las transfusiones, no durarás ni una semana.

translation.en: If I was in a hurry to die, I'd go with you.
translation.es: Si quisiera morir, iría con ustedes.

translation.en: - We all want to be home. - Where is that?
translation.es: - Todos deseamos ir a casa. - ¿Dónde es eso?

translation.en: Well, for you, I guess that's here.
As good a place as any.
- My little girl is missing! - What?
- I can't find my daughter. She isn't here. - What's the problem?
translation.es: - No encuentro a mi hija. No está. - ¿Qué sucede?

translation.en: They put her on another helicopter. I saw her.
translation.es: La llevaron en otro helicóptero. La vi.

translation.en: - What? She was alone? - No, with Doctor Rogg.
He said to tell you he will meet you on the ground.
translation.es: Él dijo que te espera en tierra.

translation.en: - We have to go. - Come on.
Nobody gave me a list. I just put people on the chopper.
translation.es: No me dieron una lista. Solo los subo al helicóptero.

translation.en: In our galaxy alone, there are billions of stars,
translation.es: En nuestra galaxia, hay miles de millones de estrellas.

translation.en: each one a sun to its own solar system.
translation.es: Cada una es el sol de su propio sistema

translation.en: And most of those suns have planets,
translation.es: y casi todos esos soles tienen planetas,

translation.en: so it stands to reason that
of these hundreds of billions of exoplanets that exist in our galaxy,
translation.es: que de esos cientos de miles de millones de exoplanetas en la galaxia,

translation.en: at least one of them has the potential to support life.
translation.es: alguno, al menos, tiene el potencial de albergar vida.

translation.en: This is K- 23, Jupiter's previously undiscovered moon.
translation.es: Esta es K-23. Una luna recién descubierta de Júpiter.

translation.en: The moon's atmosphere is governed not by the sun,
translation.es: La atmósfera lunar no depende del sol,

translation.en: but by its thermal volcanic activity.
In simpler terms, when studying K- 23's lunar spectrum,
translation.es: Para ser más claro, al estudiar el espectro lunar de K-23,
sus biomarcadores y vapores de agua,

translation.en: it appears as though it's being heated from the inside out.
translation.es: parece recibir calor desde el interior.

translation.en: While further probing will need to test for atmospheric habitability,
translation.es: Si bien debemos investigar más la habitabilidad atmosférica,

translation.en: that based on its mass, radial velocity, and orbit,
translation.es: debido a su masa, órbita y velocidad radial,

translation.en: but I gathered research for his partner years ago, read his papers.
translation.es: pero investigué para su socio hace años, leí sus artículos.

translation.en: There's a place called Portobello Beach.
- Have you heard of this? - No.
It's so beautiful. You should go there. Just off the coast near Edinburgh.
translation.es: Es hermosa. Debería ir. Está muy cerca de Edimburgo.

translation.en: In the height of summer, it's probably gonna be raining.
- It's a tourist trap. - Yeah, I'm sure.
You should go to the beach. - It's beautiful. - I will.
translation.es: - Pero vaya a la playa, es hermosa. - Iré.

translation.en: But, um, while I have you, can I ask you a very serious question
translation.es: Ya que lo tengo aquí, ¿puedo hacerle una pregunta seria

translation.en: How much of what you're searching for is reality,
translation.es: ¿Cuánto de lo que busca es realidad

translation.en: and how much of your planet is just
translation.es: y cuánto de su planeta es

translation.en: How long till Aether's in range for direct contact?
Aether will be in range in 11 hours and 54 minutes.
translation.es: Aether estará en alcance en 11 horas y 54 minutos.

translation.en: - Set an alarm for notification. - Alarm is set.
translation.es: - Configurar alarma de notificación. - Alarma configurada.

translation.en: I'm awake. How are you feeling?
- Morning, Sully. - I'm not speaking to you.
translation.es: - Buenos días, Sully. - No pienso hablar contigo.

translation.en: I had a dream you left me on K- 23, so I'm not talking to you.
translation.es: Soñé que me abandonabas en K-23. No pienso hablar contigo.

translation.en: - You started early. - Champions never rest.
translation.es: - Empezaste temprano. - El campeón no descansa.

translation.en: You still trying to beat your boys' times?
- They pay you to distract me, don't they? - Nah, I do it for free.
translation.es: - ¿Te pagan por distraerme? - No, lo hago gratis.

translation.en: - You hear anything from home? - I'm trying.

translation.es: - Buenos días, Sánchez. - Buenos días, Sully.

translation.en: This is Aether Mission K- 23, open on all channels.
translation.es: Aquí Misión Aether K-23, por todos los canales.

translation.en: - What's she hearing? - What frequency is this?
I'm running S, X, and Ka.
translation.es: Estoy usando las bandas S, X y Ka.

translation.en: - That puts our last contact-- - Including the control blackout?
translation.es: - El último contacto fue… - ¿Incluido el apagón de control?

translation.en: If Mojave goes offline, then Spain or Australia immediately grabs the signal.
translation.es: Si Mojave se desconecta, España o Australia toman la señal,

translation.en: No gaps. We're not receiving anything.
translation.es: sin intervalos, pero no recibimos nada.

translation.en: I've taken everything apart, rebooted it a dozen times, and nothing works.
translation.es: Desarmé todo, lo reinicié más de diez veces. No hay caso.

translation.en: I also couldn't make contact with the K- 23 colony flight,
translation.es: Tampoco puedo contactar al vuelo de la colonia K-23,

translation.en: which should've been in the air a week ago.
translation.es: que debía despegar hace una semana.

translation.en: I mean, it could be atmospheric,
RF pollution, or maybe a geomagnetic storm.
translation.es: contaminación de radiofrecuencia o una tormenta geomagnética,

translation.en: But none of that could last this long or disrupt both hemispheres.
translation.es: pero nada de eso duraría tanto tiempo o afectaría a ambos hemisferios.

translation.en: Hello, this is Barbeau Observatory. A family member has been left behind.
translation.es: Hola, aquí el Observatorio Barbeau. Dejaron atrás a un familiar.

translation.en: Somebody needs to come back for her.
Hello, this is Barbeau Observatory. An outpost child has been left. Sh--
translation.es: Hola, aquí el Observatorio Barbeau. Dejaron a una niña del puesto avanzado…

translation.en: She's a-- She's an unidentified child.
She's seven or eight. She's alone.
translation.es: Tiene siete u ocho años. Está sola.

translation.en: Somebody has to come back. Sh--
Somebody's gotta be coming back for you, because I can't help you.
translation.es: Alguien tiene que volver por ti, porque yo no puedo ayudarte.

translation.en: You have any brothers or sisters?
You're not deaf, right? You can hear me talking?
You just want to piss me off.
What is that? Is that an iris?
Aether is within direct contact range. There are no incoming messages.
translation.es: Aether, en alcance de contacto directo. No hay mensajes entrantes.

translation.en: Come in, Aether. This is Barbeau Observatory.
translation.es: Adelante, Aether. Aquí el Observatorio Barbeau. ¿Me escucha?

translation.en: Come in, Aether. This is Barbeau Observatory.
translation.es: Adelante, Aether. Aquí el Observatorio Barbeau. ¿Me escucha?

translation.en: Come in, Aether. This is Barbeau Observatory.
This is Barbeau Observatory. Are you receiving this?

translation.es: Es una nave espacial. Está muy lejos.

translation.en: coming back from a planet that we-- we hoped would be our future, but…
translation.es: Vuelve de un planeta que esperábamos que fuera nuestro futuro…

translation.en: Things didn't quite turn out that way.
That's why I have to contact them.

translation.es: Ahora. Antes de que sea muy tarde.

translation.en: The antenna's our problem. It's not strong enough.
translation.es: A nuestra antena le falta potencia.

translation.en: Doesn't matter what direction we put it in.
They're not answering us because they can't hear us.
translation.es: No nos responden porque no nos oyen.

translation.en: Given all the variables, the fact that we can't contact the K- 23 colony flight
translation.es: Dadas todas las variables, la falta de contacto con el vuelo de la colonia

translation.en: and can't raise Mojave on any frequency,
translation.es: y la ausencia de Mojave en todas las frecuencias,

translation.en: that the fault lies with us.
But we have exhausted every possible trouble area on our side
translation.es: Pero agotamos todas las posibles áreas de problemas de nuestro lado

translation.en: If this were a less experienced crew, this ship would be in full- blown panic.
translation.es: Con una tripulación menos experimentada, ya habría cundido el pánico.

translation.en: Mission Specialist Sullivan is now breaking every protocol
translation.es: La especialista de misión Sullivan está violando los protocolos

translation.en: as she attempts to make any kind of contact,
translation.es: para lograr cualquier tipo de contacto,

translation.en: This action is under my direction.
Mitchell is… simply the best flier there is,
translation.es: Mitchell es sencillamente el mejor piloto del mundo,

translation.en: but he's anxious to get home.
Maya and Sanchez are on 12- hour shifts as they boot and reboot the comms system,
translation.es: Maya y Sánchez hacen turnos de 12 horas para reiniciar el sistema de comunicación,

translation.en: Overall, the crew's spirit remains high as we near the end of our journey.
translation.es: En general, la tripulación conserva el ánimo hacia el final del viaje.

translation.en: Our two- year mission to K- 23
translation.es: Tras dos años, regresamos de la misión a K-23

translation.en: has us returning with more answers than questions.
Can it sustain life? Yes. Can it expand? Yes.
translation.es: TRAYECTORIA DE MISIÓN AETHER ¿Puede albergar vida? Sí. ¿Puede desarrollarse? Sí.

translation.en: Could it be home? Yes, it could.
Every question we set out to answer, we did…
except the one that lingers in the air.
translation.es: Salvo el que flota en el aire:

translation.en: Your breakfast has timed out. Would you like another?
translation.es: Su video de desayuno finalizó. ¿Desea otro?

translation.en: Doesn't make much sense to me either.
You know, there's no rule that says you have to touch everything.
translation.es: No hay una regla que te obligue a tocar todo.

translation.en: It's the most important star in the sky.
translation.es: Es la estrella más importante del cielo.

translation.en: If you ever get lost, it'll help you find your way.
translation.es: Si algún día te pierdes, te indicará el camino.

translation.en: I called you. You didn't answer.
Can't answer your phone when you're working?
I called to tell you I'm not pregnant.
translation.es: Quería decirte que no estoy embarazada.

translation.en: possible sighting of a life- form that ultimately proved false.
translation.es: posible avistaje de una forma de vida que finalmente no ocurrió.

translation.en: You want to be an explorer, Augustine.
To discover new worlds, to… give life some hope.
translation.es: Descubrir nuevos mundos. Dar esperanza a la vida.

translation.en: But while you're doing all that, your own life is just
I'm sure it's for the best.
It shouldn't be up this far.
There is an antenna that's stronger than ours.
translation.es: Hay una antena más potente que la nuestra.

translation.en: It's protected by this mountain range.
translation.es: Está protegida por esta cadena montañosa.

translation.en: So the air might still be good.
translation.es: El aire quizá aún esté bien.

translation.en: We get to that antenna, somebody'll hear us.
translation.es: Si llegamos a ella, alguien nos oirá.

translation.en: It's all right. You have to.
Never take it off, no matter what.
translation.es: No te lo quites nunca, pase lo que pase.

translation.en: Then I heard this voice that was like, Oh, damn, you smell good.
translation.es: Entonces, oigo que alguien dice: Demonios, qué bien hueles.

translation.en: - What? - And it was the guy!
- No way, you're lying. - Why would I lie?
translation.es: - No. Mientes. - ¿Por qué iba a mentir?

translation.en: - He did that? - No, he didn't.
- Oh my God. He did that? - Yeah, he did.
So, what? He was behind you?
He was right behind me. He came down onto my neck.
translation.es: Estaba justo detrás. Se me acercó a la nuca.

translation.en: It's okay. You can come in.
If you're late, you're not hot.  Yeah, but… Okay.
translation.es: Si llegas tarde, no me atraes. Sí, pero… Está bien.

translation.en: So you don't mind if someone's--  No, I wanted to know if he was hot.
translation.es: - ¿No te molesta que te…? - No, quería saber si era atractivo.

translation.en: And that is my very, very best friend from high school.
translation.es: Y ella es mi mejor amiga de la secundaria.

translation.en: He turns up. - Wait for it.

translation.es: El gato más inteligente del mundo, Einstein.

translation.en: I need to hear what happened.
translation.es: - Bien. Necesito saber qué pasó. - ¿Con qué?

translation.en: - I don't know. - I told you, the guy with…
translation.es: - No sé. - Ya les conté. El tipo de la…

translation.en: I'm so sorry for so many things.
Do you want to change games?
- I'm on about a two- month winning streak. - I'm pacing myself.
translation.es: - Llevo dos meses de racha ganadora. - Me estoy reservando.

translation.en: I got into NASA 'cause I was damn good at mathematics.
translation.es: Entré a la NASA porque era muy bueno en matemática.

translation.en: Now, I don't like to use the word prodigy, but--
translation.es: No me gusta usar la palabra prodigio, pero…

translation.en: You also broke the family dog's leg when you strapped it to a wooden rocket.
translation.es: Le rompiste la pata a tu perro al atarlo a un cohete de madera.

translation.en: - That's irrelevant. - Not to the dog.
translation.es: - Eso es irrelevante. - No para el perro.

translation.en: Did you know there are over 60 billion possible combinations
translation.es: ¿Sabes que hay más de 60 mil millones de combinaciones posibles

translation.en: of rummy hands at the start of the game?
translation.es: de manos de rummy al inicio del juego?

translation.en: So this little streak you're on…
translation.es: Así que esta pequeña racha tuya…

translation.en: A streak that's lasted from one side of the universe to the other.
translation.es: Que duró de un extremo del universo al otro.

translation.en: …is nothing more than a minuscule blip of luck
among 60 billion possible combinations. But when you apply…
translation.es: en 60 mil millones de combinaciones, pero cuando aplicas…

translation.en: genius- level math skills to the equation,
translation.es: a la ecuación el talento matemático de un genio,

translation.en: Hmm. And that is what you're doing now?
You, my friend, are what my fellow mathematicians refer to as… a simpleton.
translation.es: Tú eres, amiga mía, lo que mis colegas matemáticos llaman

translation.en: - We've deviated off course. - How far?
Can't tell yet. Auto- deactivated at some point.
translation.es: No lo sé. No sé cuándo se desactivó.

translation.en: Shut us down. Kill the engines before we get completely sideways.
translation.es: Apaga los motores antes de que nos alejemos totalmente.

translation.en: - Problem with navigation. - So we're off course. How far?
Okay, we'll need to figure that out.
What is the variance for the alarm?
translation.es: ¿Cuál es la varianza de la alarma?

translation.en: - 0.4 degrees. - And it sounded for what? 80 seconds?
- At 30,000 miles per hour. - Plus coast speed after engine kill.
translation.es: - A 48 000 km/h. - Más velocidad de inercia sin motor.

translation.en: - Non- existent without comms. - Sanchez, shut off the alarm.
translation.es: - No sin comunicaciones. - Sánchez, apaga la alarma.

translation.en: Jupiter probes, the beacon we left behind at K- 23,
translation.es: Las sondas de Júpiter, la baliza que dejamos en K-23,

translation.en: the supply probe on its way there now, some dying satellites--
translation.es: la sonda de provisiones que va hacia ahí, satélites moribundos…

translation.en: We can reference the K- 23 beacon as our starting point.
translation.es: Podemos usar la baliza en K-23 como punto de partida.

translation.en: We can still build a course from there to the satellite.
translation.es: Podemos trazar un rumbo de ahí al satélite.

translation.en: Sully, get him exact numbers on the beacon and pulse.
translation.es: Sully, dale los números de la baliza y el pulso.

translation.en: Maya, help Sanchez with the course design. And move fast. We're drifting while we work.
translation.es: Maya, ayuda a Sánchez a trazar el rumbo. Rápido, seguimos alejándonos.

translation.en: Yeah, but it puts us in zones that haven't been cleared for passage.
translation.es: Sí, pero nos lleva por zonas no aprobadas para el paso.

translation.en: Well, we know there was meteor activity here,
translation.es: Sabemos que hubo actividad de meteoritos aquí

translation.en: and we can avoid that, but…
Anyone else have a better idea of how to get home?
translation.es: ¿Quién tiene una idea mejor para ir a casa?
Muy bien. Entonces, ese es nuestro rumbo.

translation.en: Okay, boss, but I sure don't like passing through zones that haven't been cleared.
translation.es: Bien, pero no me gusta pasar por zonas no aprobadas.

translation.en: No need to keep checking it. The air is safe here.
translation.es: No hace falta seguir revisándolo. El aire es seguro aquí.

translation.en: Come on, then. Let's get you in the car. Come on.
My father had a stroke, so we wanted to spend time with him.
translation.es: Mi papá tuvo un ACV, y queríamos pasar tiempo con él.

translation.en: Did you tell her about me?
If you want her to know about you, you can introduce yourself.
translation.es: Si quieres que sepa de ti, puedes presentarte.

translation.en: You know, this machine was actually designed
translation.es: En realidad, esta máquina fue diseñada

translation.en: to detect alien life- forms that might invade our system.
translation.es: para detectar alienígenas que invadieran nuestro organismo.

translation.en: You wanna know if it's a girl or a boy?
translation.es: ¿Quieres saber si es niña o niño?

translation.en: I just didn't see this coming.
Are you saying I couldn't help myself?
- No, you said that, not me. - Did I say that?
translation.es: - Eso lo dijiste tú, yo no. - ¿Yo lo dije?

translation.en: I didn't see it coming either.
So, what are we gonna name her?
I knew a face like that once.
Yeah. Her hair was a little different shade, but…
translation.es: Sí. El pelo era de otro color, pero…

translation.en: She was as loud as you are quiet.
translation.es: Era tan bulliciosa como tú eres callada.

translation.en: When she'd laugh, everybody would turn and look.
translation.es: Cuando se reía, todos volteaban para mirarla.

translation.en: I think she'd laugh so much
because she was that much smarter than everybody else, and she knew it.
translation.es: porque era mucho más lista que todos los demás y lo sabía.

translation.en: I wish you'd tell me something about your life, Iris.
translation.es: Quisiera que me contaras algo de tu vida, Iris.

translation.en: When we get to Lake Hazen, there's gonna be every kind of food there.
translation.es: Cuando lleguemos al lago Hazen, habrá todo tipo de comida.

translation.en: We keep going in that direction.
It's all right. We're gonna be fine.
I thought I'd lost you. I thought I'd lost you.
Just going where Sanchez tells me to go.
Nothing yet. It's just a glitch.
translation.es: Todavía nada. Es solo una falla.

translation.en: Until someone tells me different, Tom.
translation.es: Hasta que sepa que no, Tom.

translation.en: This is the spaceship Aether returning from Jupiter Mission.
translation.es: Aquí la nave Aether volviendo de la Misión Júpiter. ¿Me oye?
Aquí la nave Aether volviendo de la Misión Júpiter. ¿Me oye? Sí.

translation.en: This is Lake Hazen Weather Station.
translation.es: Aquí la Estación meteorológica lago Hazen.

translation.en: Lake Hazen, I can't tell you how happy I am to hear your voice.
translation.es: Lago Hazen, no imagina lo feliz que estoy de oír su voz.

translation.en: For some reason, you're the only person who wants to talk to me.
translation.es: No sé por qué nadie más me quiere hablar.

translation.en: We've lost contact with NASA and everyone else.
translation.es: Perdimos contacto con la NASA y los demás.

translation.en: Do you have information on our transmission blackout?
translation.es: ¿Tiene información sobre nuestro apagón de transmisión?

translation.en: How much have you picked up about the conditions on Earth?
translation.es: ¿Qué les comunicaron sobre la situación en la Tierra?

translation.en: I'm sorry, Lake Hazen, I missed that last transmission.
translation.es: Disculpe, Lago Hazen. Perdí esa última transmisión.

translation.en: Lake Hazen, are you receiving this?
I don't know all the details. I know it was a mistake.
translation.es: No conozco todos los detalles. Sé que fue un error.

translation.en: - What is it? - I can't pull it up on radar.
translation.es: - ¿Qué es? - No aparece en el radar.

translation.en: - Can you rotate on this axis? - Trying now.
translation.es: - ¿Puedes rotar en este eje? - Eso intento.

translation.en: It's what happens when you fly in the goddamn dark.
translation.es: Lo que ocurre cuando vuelas a ciegas.

translation.en: Aether? Mission Specialist Sullivan, do you copy? Hello?
Lake Hazen, can you hear me?
Stay on current to assess any damage beyond the comms.
translation.es: Evaluaremos daños, además de las comunicaciones.

translation.en: Contained. There's damage to a lab wall.
translation.es: Una pared del laboratorio sufrió daños.

translation.en: What's the status on secondary and tertiary communications?
translation.es: ¿Estado de las comunicaciones secundarias y terciarias?

translation.en: Full reports on all systems, and let's at least get the radar fixed.
translation.es: Informe completo de los sistemas. Al menos reparemos el radar.

translation.en: But it's gonna take a walk outside.
translation.es: pero habrá que salir de paseo.

translation.en: Stole it from the LM platform support.
translation.es: Lo robé del soporte de plataforma del módulo lunar.

translation.en: NASA can worry about how to unload their supply canisters when we get back.
translation.es: Que la NASA vea cómo descargar sus provisiones cuando volvamos.

translation.en: What do you think of the name Caroline?
Should come in under the deadline. I've been thinking. It's gotta be me and Maya going out.
translation.es: - Terminaremos antes de lo previsto. - Tenemos que salir Maya y yo.

translation.en: Okay, I'll probably tag along, help carry that thing.
translation.es: Bien. Yo las acompañaré y ayudaré a cargar esa cosa.

translation.en: There's no gravity out there. It's not gonna be too heavy for us girls to handle.
translation.es: Afuera no hay gravedad. No será demasiado pesado para las chicas.

translation.en: I don't like to miss a chance to stroll around the block.
translation.es: Nunca dejo pasar la oportunidad de dar un paseo.

translation.en: Is he going because he's worried about you or because I've never walked before?
translation.es: ¿Va porque se preocupa por ti, o porque es mi primera salida?

translation.en: He wouldn't send you out if he wasn't sure you could do it.
translation.es: No te enviaría si no pudieras hacerlo.

translation.en: Good. As long as one of us is.
translation.es: Bien. Por lo menos uno de nosotros piensa que puedo.

translation.en: I mean, she's so small. Where does it all keep coming from?
Now you know how I feel.
Do it now before you secure the helmet.
translation.es: Hazlo antes de colocarte el casco.

translation.en: It's a bitch to get off.
We can go as fast or slow as you're comfortable out here.
translation.es: Aquí afuera podemos ir al ritmo que te resulte cómodo.

translation.en: That goes for you too, Sully.
translation.es: Lo mismo vale para ti, Sully.

translation.en: The installation site should be coming up.
translation.es: El sitio de instalación está cerca.

translation.en: Got eyes on the antenna site.
Hey, Sully. What do you think of the name Florence?
translation.es: Sully, ¿qué te parece el nombre Florence?

translation.en: The kids would call her Flo.

translation.es: Quizá solo se aflojó un poco.

translation.en: We've got some detached wires, but the nose is intact.
translation.es: Hay algunos cables sueltos, pero la nariz está intacta.

translation.en: I'm sorry? Did you say the nose?
Yeah, I think I might have the song for you.
translation.es: Sí, creo que tengo la canción ideal.

translation.en: Uh, right here. Here you go. Enjoy, kids.
translation.es: Esta. Aquí va. Que la disfruten, chicos.

translation.en: Okay, Mitchell, let's see if we've got any radar.
translation.es: Bien, Mitchell, veamos si funciona el radar.

translation.en: Copy that. Give me a second.
I am in the wrong profession.
I've been saying that for two years.
translation.es: Te lo digo desde hace dos años.

translation.en: Yeah, just let me finish this last connection.
translation.es: Sí, termino con esta última conexión.

translation.en: Let's get back and see who wants to talk to us.
translation.es: Volvamos y veamos quién quiere hablarnos.

translation.en: - Sully, you take the lead. - Okay.
Can't tell about comms, but radar looks like--
translation.es: No sé cómo están las comunicaciones, pero el radar…

translation.en: Ade, you need to move fast. You need to go.
- Get out of there. - Go now, Ade!
- Maya! Get out of there now! - I'm stuck!
Is everybody all right? Everybody safe?
- You okay? - Son of a bitch!
Let's get inside before Maya breaks something else.
translation.es: Entremos antes de que Maya rompa otra cosa.

translation.en: Punching in now. Fingers crossed on comms.
translation.es: Conectando. Dedos cruzados por las comunicaciones.

translation.en: I am gonna celebrate the first and last time I walk in space.
translation.es: Voy a celebrar mi primer y último paseo espacial.

translation.en: No, no, I'm gonna have two drinks.
We could all use a drink.
Sanchez, have med- pack ready to meet us in the airlock.
translation.es: Sánchez, lleva el botiquín a la esclusa.

translation.en: Sanchez is on it. Ade, her oxygen levels are falling fast.
translation.es: Sánchez está en camino. Ade, su nivel de oxígeno se desploma.

translation.en: - What did I do wrong? - You didn't do anything wrong.
- Just breathe, Maya. - Sanchez, get that med- pack in here!
I'm with you. Look at me. I'm with you.
- I'm gonna take your helmet off. - Okay.
translation.es: - Voy a quitarte el casco. - Bien.

translation.en: - Okay? You're gonna be fine. - Okay.
How long have we got? That's it.
- That's too much blood. - It's okay.
- There's too much blood. - You're okay.
- We don't have time. Put pressure. - Here? Hang on.
translation.es: - No hay tiempo. Aplica presión. - ¿Aquí? Espera.

translation.en: - I got it. - You got her?
translation.es: - No hay tiempo. Aplica presión. - ¿Aquí? Espera. ¿La tienes?

translation.en: There's too much blood. Too much blood.
- I got it. - You're gonna be fine. Okay?
translation.es: - Lo veo. - Vas a estar bien. ¿Sí?

translation.en: Maya, please breathe. Okay?  Puncture wound to the lower back.
translation.es: - Maya, respira, por favor. ¿Sí? - Herida punzante en zona lumbar.

translation.en: - You're gonna be fine. Yes. - No.
translation.es: - Vas a estar bien. Sí. - No.

translation.en: - Maya. - Why won't the blood stop?
translation.es: - Maya. - ¿Por qué no para de sangrar?

translation.en: - Maya. - I have to stay here.
- Okay, hold on. - Mitchell, get us ready.
Maya. Keep looking at me. Maya. Maya. Breathe.
translation.es: Maya. Concéntrate en mí. Maya. Respira.

translation.en: Lake Hazen, this is Aether. Are you receiving?
Captain, we just got our first view of Earth.
translation.es: Capitán, tenemos la primera imagen de la Tierra.

translation.en: I tied into the signals of the old Astron satellite telescope.
translation.es: Me conecté a las señales del viejo telescopio del satélite Astron.

translation.en: Lake Hazen, this is Aether. Are you receiving?
Lake Hazen, this is Aether. Are you receiving this transmission?
translation.es: Lago Hazen, aquí Aether. ¿Puede escuchar esta transmisión?

translation.en: We're operational now and just got a visual on Earth.
translation.es: Ahora estamos operativos y tenemos una imagen de la Tierra.

translation.en: I'm afraid we didn't do a good job
of looking after the place while you were away.
Do you see any new data that suggests possible safe entry points for us?
translation.es: ¿Ve algún dato nuevo que sugiera puntos de entrada posibles para nosotros?
Las áreas aptas para supervivencia son subterráneas.

translation.en: Does this make sense to you?
If we want to get back to K- 23, yes.
translation.es: Si deseamos volver a K-23, sí.

translation.en: It's actually a pretty good plan.

translation.es: Desviamos la aproximación a la Tierra

translation.en: then make gravity our friend to save fuel on the turnaround.
translation.es: y usamos la gravedad para ahorrar combustible al dar la vuelta.

translation.en: - Why would we do that? - There's nothing left for us down there.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué haríamos eso? - Allí no hay esperanza.

translation.en: - We're not slingshotting back into space. - We'll die if we go back.
translation.es: - No nos lanzaremos de vuelta. - Si volvemos, morimos.

translation.en: - He's still alive. - Poles will be the last areas hit.
translation.es: - Él sigue vivo. - Los polos caerán de último.

translation.en: - Air contamination is rising. - We don't know anything.
translation.es: - La contaminación aérea aumenta. - No lo sabemos.

translation.en: We all saw what it looked like.
translation.es: - La contaminación aérea aumenta. - No lo sabemos. - Lo vimos. - Debíamos ir a K-23,

translation.en: Our mission was to go to K- 23, turn around, and come home.
translation.es: - Lo vimos. - Debíamos ir a K-23, dar la vuelta y volver a casa.

translation.en: Lake Hazen, are you still picking this up?
Lake Hazen, this is Aether Flight Commander Gordon Adewole.
translation.es: Lago Hazen, soy el comandante de vuelo Gordon Adewole.

translation.en: but they have me curious as to how you came up with them,
translation.es: pero me intriga cómo los realizó

translation.en: and how you know so much about our flight plan.
translation.es: y cómo sabe tanto de nuestro plan de vuelo.

translation.en: I had hoped to meet you upon our return.
Unfortunately, that seems less likely as of the last few days.
translation.es: Por desgracia, eso parece menos probable en estos últimos días.

translation.en: Given your location, are you certain there are no safe regions
translation.es: Dada su ubicación, ¿está seguro de que no hay regiones seguras en el hemisferio sur?
de que no hay regiones seguras en el hemisferio sur?

translation.en: We'll discuss our options up here and hopefully, speak again.
translation.es: Analizaremos nuestras opciones y volveremos a hablar, espero.

translation.en: There is a message for you.
Um, I don't know if you know what's going on down here,
translation.es: no sé si sabes lo que está pasando aquí abajo,

translation.en: but, um, we're being asked to evacuate.
I want you to know where we're going,
because I won't be able to contact you anymore.
translation.es: porque no podré volver a comunicarme contigo.

translation.en: It's funny when I think about how long I've been doing this.
translation.es: Es curioso cuánto tiempo llevo haciendo esto.

translation.en: You know, 20 years ago, Kath and I,
we used to talk about the risks.
A certain amount of danger is involved, and…
I was the one that was supposed to be at risk.
translation.es: Se suponía que yo era el que corría el riesgo,

translation.en: And they were supposed to be safe.
translation.es: y que ellos estaban a salvo.

translation.en: You have two reentry pods on this ship, and I'd like to take one of them.
translation.es: La nave tiene dos cápsulas de reentrada. Quisiera llevarme una.

translation.en: It's your job to turn the ship around, start a new life. Do better this time.
translation.es: Tu deber es dar la vuelta y empezar una nueva vida, hacerlo mejor esta vez.

translation.en: to keep a promise that I made to my family.
translation.es: cumplir la promesa que le hice a mi familia.

translation.en: - It takes two to fly that. - I'll manage.
translation.es: - Se necesitan dos para volar eso. - Me arreglaré.

translation.en: I'm going to go with you.
- Why would you wanna do that? - I've been thinking.
translation.es: ¿Por qué razón? Me puse a pensar.

translation.en: Been thinking a lot about time…
and how it gets used and why.
translation.es: sobre cómo lo usamos y por qué.

translation.en: Why one person lives a lifetime
translation.es: Por qué algunos viven una vida entera,

translation.en: and another only gets a few years.
My daughter, Maria, she died when she was four.
translation.es: Mi hija, María, murió a los cuatro años.

translation.en: She would have been the same age as Maya.
translation.es: Habría tenido la misma edad que Maya.

translation.en: Sometimes at night, when I couldn't sleep,
translation.es: Algunas noches, cuando no podía dormir,

translation.en: I would pretend that they were friends.
They'd talk about school together. Or boys.
translation.es: Que hablaban de la universidad, de chicos.

translation.en: I want to take Maya home.
translation.es: Quiero llevar a Maya a casa.

translation.en: It seems like the best use of my time.
translation.es: Es el mejor uso que puedo darle a mi tiempo.

translation.en: So I was thinking I'll take a ride home with my buddy, if that's okay.
translation.es: Así que, si te parece bien, pensé en acompañar a mi amigo.

translation.en: Take care of yourself, okay? And our little Caroline.
translation.es: Cuídate, ¿sí? Y a nuestra pequeña Caroline.

translation.en: I hope you find your family.
translation.es: Ojalá que halles a tu familia.

translation.en: This is Aether. Are you receiving?
Dr. Lofthouse, can you hear me?
We're headed into an ionization blackout, so I'm gonna lose you soon.
translation.es: Nos dirigimos a un apagón de ionización. Pronto lo perderé,

translation.en: But I wanted to contact you first to thank you.
translation.es: pero antes quería comunicarme para agradecerle.

translation.en: Commander Adewole and I are turning back.
translation.es: El comandante Adewole y yo daremos la vuelta.

translation.en: Captain Mitchell and Specialist Sanchez decided on reentry.
translation.es: El capitán Mitchell y el especialista Sánchez retornaron.

translation.en: Flight Engineer Maya Lawrence, she suffered an accident during the flight.
translation.es: La ingeniera de vuelo Maya Lawrence sufrió un accidente durante el vuelo.

translation.en: What you did… You discovered so much up here.
translation.es: Usted descubrió tantas cosas aquí arriba.

translation.en: Well, you pointed to an incredible world.
I wish you could have seen it.
Lake Hazen will have to do.
translation.es: Me conformaré con el lago Hazen.

translation.en: How did you end up there?
I thought maybe I could help someone.

translation.es: Pues así fue, sin ninguna duda.

translation.en: You know, you're one of the reasons I joined the space program.
translation.es: Usted fue una de mis razones para unirme al programa espacial.

translation.en: You had done some work with my mother, Jean Sullivan.
translation.es: Usted trabajó con mi madre, Jean Sullivan.

translation.en: She brought home a moon rock you gave her.
translation.es: Y le regaló una roca lunar.

translation.en: I thought it was the most amazing thing ever.
translation.es: A mí me pareció lo más sensacional.

translation.en: It made me want to go up and find more.
translation.es: Me dio deseos de subir a buscar más.

translation.en: I wish I could have thanked you for it in person, Dr. Lofthouse.
translation.es: Ojalá hubiera podido agradecerle en persona.

translation.en: It's very nice to finally meet you.
translation.es: Es un placer conocerte por fin.

translation.en: The colony site, it feels like Colorado.
translation.es: El sitio de la colonia es como Colorado.

translation.en: Have you ever been there, to the mountains?
translation.es: ¿Alguna vez fue allí, a las montañas?

translation.en: The air is so crisp, and…
and the planet has that smell.
translation.es: y el planeta tiene un aroma

translation.en: It's like pine trees are hidden somewhere underground,
translation.es: como si hubiera pinos escondidos bajo tierra

translation.en: First weeks we were there, I kept looking up, expecting to see a blue sky,
translation.es: Durante las primeras semanas, miraba arriba y esperaba un cielo azul,

translation.en: from the light reflecting off Jupiter.
translation.es: por la luz que se refleja de Júpiter.

translation.en: When the orbit is just right,
translation.es: En un momento de la órbita,

translation.en: you're sure you could almost touch it.
And that light, it makes all the colors explode, everything.
translation.es: Y esa luz hace vibrar todos los colores. Todo.

translation.en: It's like landing in Oz and seeing real color for the first time.
translation.es: Es como aterrizar en Oz y ver los colores por primera vez.

translation.en: I've never seen anything so beautiful.
I guess it's just us now.
